name: Light Shining in Darkness
description:
This game was made for a local game jam. Enjoy!

Movement - Arrow Keys

Switch Colors - "q" or "e"

 - Black - "e"

- White - "q"

Go to Main Menu - Escape button (Only in-game)

Beware of the moving platforms in the middle, keep caution as it will make the player fall off. A little readjustment will let the player stay on the moving platforms without falling.
